LanguageData.Yokai_IceDrink.label: Winter's Blessing
LanguageData.Yokai_IceDrink.description: Made with Snow Milk, this drink drastically increases the consumer's heat tolerance for a day. The effect will weaken before disappearing completely.
LanguageData.Yokai_HotDrink.label: Summer's Rebuke
LanguageData.Yokai_HotDrink.description: By changing the method of preperation, Snow Milk can also produce Summer's Rebuke. This drink has the opposite effect of Winter's Blessing, and therefore increases the consumer's resistance to cold.
